# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: should throw StudioCMSCoreError for unsupported favicon extension
validImage "studiocms-blocks" should have non-null light and dark properties
Post - should validate complete post data
loadChangelog - throws on unknown semver category
getFileSizeInKilobytes returns fractional for non-exact sizes
Deepmerge - Effect Service - respects custom options for merging arrays
should handle complex nested JSON structures
convertToSafeString - returns empty string for input with only underscores
loadChangelog - parses GitHub usernames to links

Password Utility - constantTimeEqual - should return false for inputs "abc" and "abcd"
should throw error when JSON is invalid
Password Utility - verifySafe - should return "undefined" for input "uniquepassword123"
Libravatar Utils - serviceName for domain "null" with https=true
Libravatar Utils - serviceName for domain "example.com" with https=true
Deepmerge - throws an error if the merge function throws
Clack - ClackError sets tag and cause
SMTPService - Verify Transport with Invalid Config
validImage "studiocms-blobs" should have non-null light and dark properties
should have a valid entry for image name: studiocms-blobs
Clack - useClackError returns Effect that fails with ClackError if error is thrown
loadChangelog - parses example changelog markdown
parameters:
# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: setLocals - merges general values without overwriting security/plugins
setLocals - merges security values without overwriting general/plugins
Buildkit CLI - build command with no entry points
Password Utility - breakSecurePassword throws error for input "legacy:salt:hash"
Plugin Hook Tests - Validates Hook Implementations
CheckIfUnsafe.password - should return false for password "uniquepassword123"
Libravatar Utils - serviceName for domain "example.com" with https=false
RenderedProtectData should validate rendered protected data structure
remapFilterSitemap should return correct locations for filter 'docs'
loadChangelog - throws on unexpected node type
quoteIdent correctly quotes identifier for sqlite
shows error toast if response is not ok
